basics.name: Edward Sanders
basics.label: Creative and Collaborative Software Builder
basics.summary: I am a collaborative and passionate full-stack developer with over 7 years of experience solving difficult and complex problems for customers and businesses. I thrive in cross-functional, product-oriented environments where I can work with other disciplines and stakeholders to quickly bring products to market. I have a proven track record of guiding teams to successful outcomes across diverse industries such as retail, medical billing, and learning management, employing a wide array of languages (TypeScript/JavaScript, Kotlin, C#), frameworks (React, Spring, .NET), persistence and streaming technologies (PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka), and cloud technologies (Azure, Tanzu).

work.name: Dick's Sporting Goods
highlights: Develop products to solve business problems with a wide variety of technologies.
Work with product managers, product designers, and business stakeholders to clarify business requirements and craft solutions.
Review pull requests and mentor junior developers.
Utilize CI/CD best practices and cloud technologies to build scalable and maintanable cloud native applications.
Thoroughly test and document code and processes.
Guide code standards by researching and introducing patterns and practices.
Lead Front-end Excellence group and Stores Design System initiatives.
Recognized as the Store Technology All-Star for Q4 FY2023 for my contributions to Front-end Excellence and Stores Design System work.

work.name: Dick's Sporting Goods
highlights: Built and scaled an in-house appointment scheduling and management product used by nearly 300 stores and hundreds of thousands of customers.
Digitized paper forms, improving store labor performance.
Gave a well-received presentation on Tailwind CSS at a company-wide tech meetup.
Guided product design decision-making when product team lacked design presence.

work.name: Tobii Dynavox
highlights: Improved development processes by encouraging and implementing best practices in project management, change management, documentation, and TDD.
Built an automated order processor that saved one team forty hours of work every week by leveraging automated PDF generation and synchronizing data across multiple systems.
Created an application that helped internal users send personalized text messages to customers using the Twilio and Microsoft Graph APIs.
Designed and implemented the first version of an in-house customer management system.
